location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '6'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This scene shows the landscape of Sedab from the sea.The photograph was likely taken from on board ship. Rocky mountains rise in the background. A settlement occupies the thin strip of land along the shoreline from left to right of centre along the horizon line, where palm trees can be seen.To the left of the image a rocky spit of land extends into the sea.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Sedab.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘6’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
